channel.title: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?
channel.description:
HELP ME PLZ. I AM TRYING TO GET ONE OF THESE BANNER THINGS [url]https://i155.photobucket.com/albums/s311/sersoft2/bar.png[/url] but i simply can't.
can someone explain how? i am a nerd IN TRAINING you know.

item.title: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
why does your userbar have one of the most ludicrous grammatical errors in the english language?

Read full topic

item.title: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
This is useful as well.

And yeah, just so you know, as Savant said, those thingies are called userbars. Google that word up and you’ll get some interesting results, I’m sure.

Read full topic
item.source: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?

item.title: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?
item.dc:creator: ThatsNotPoetry
item.description:
Step 1: Lose the Naruto avatar.
Step 2: Use google before asking questions that relate to any forum, ever.
Step 3: I promise you, video games and video game references are not the coolest things in the world. (profileprofileprofile.)
Step 4: Nerdome is not the holy grail. In fact, it’s really not even a thing, so lay off it. However it does require starting from square one, and square one is computer basics. Start at square one.
Step 5: What was I talking about again?

Read full topic
item.source: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?

item.title: HOW DO I GET ONE OF THESE!?!?
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
By “getting” I am assuming you think of “making” them

This tutorial should help you make one of those userbars

And next time, when making a thread, try not to rape the “?” and “!” and relax a bit
